info.title: FormForge RAG WebSocket API

joinUploadRoom.description: Channel for joining an upload room to receive notifications

leaveUploadRoom.description: Channel for leaving an upload room to stop receiving notifications

uploadProgress.description: Channel for receiving real-time upload progress updates

uploadComplete.description: Channel for receiving upload completion notifications

uploadError.description: Channel for receiving upload error notifications

joinUploadRoomMessage.name: Join Upload Room Message
joinUploadRoomMessage.description: The unique upload ID string that identifies which upload room to join

leaveUploadRoomMessage.name: Leave Upload Room Message
leaveUploadRoomMessage.description: The unique upload ID string that identifies which upload room to leave

uploadProgressMessage.name: Upload Progress Message
uploadProgressMessage.description: Contains information about the current progress of an upload

bytesReceived.description: Number of bytes received so far

bytesExpected.description: Total number of bytes expected for the complete upload

completed.description: Whether the upload has completed (will be false during progress events)

uploadCompleteMessage.name: Upload Complete Message
uploadCompleteMessage.description: Contains information about a completed upload including processing results

chunks.description: Number of chunks created during processing

totalCharacters.description: Total characters processed from the document

uploadErrorMessage.name: Upload Error Message
uploadErrorMessage.description: Contains error information about a failed upload
